data.chText: 不公正，不公平（的对待或行为）
data.enText: the fact of a situation being unfair and of people not being treated equally; an unfair act or an example of unfair treatment

data.chText: 强烈感觉到遭受不公正待遇
她被那句话的不公激怒了。
data.enText: She was enraged at the injustice of the remark.

data.chText: 报告揭露了这个制度的种种不公正。
data.enText: The report exposes the injustices of the system.

data.chText: 我们可能冤枉他了。这工作干得不错。
data.enText: We may have been doing him an injustice. This work is good.

simple_means.memory_skill: in 不，无，非 + justice 公正 → 不公正

means: 不公正，不公平(的对待或行为)

data.chText: 我们可能冤枉他了。这工作干得不错。
data.enText: We may have been doing him an injustice. This work is good.

tr: the practice of being unjust or unfair

value.def: Injustice is a lack of fairness in a situation.

example.tran: 他们将继续与不公平现象作斗争。

example.ex: They resented the injustices of the system.
example.tran: 他们怨恨制度的种种不公。

value.def: If you say that someone has done you an injustice, you mean that they have been unfair in the way that they have judged you or treated you.

example.ex: The article does them both an injustice.
example.tran: 那篇文章对他们俩都不公。

value.tran: 不公正地评判;不公正地对待

trans: 不公正地评判;不公正地对待
